metadata.title: CVE-2015-4054 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
PgBouncer before 1.5.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(NULL pointer dereference and crash) by sending a password packet before astartup packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4054` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pgbouncer - 1.5.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pgbouncer package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.5-1').
